snippet: The police said the raid was for a tax investigation, and a spokesman denied any connection to the Bitcoin reports.
abstract: Australian police raid Sydney home of computer expert and entrepreneur Craig Steven Wright, after two news outlets identified him as likely creator of digital currency Bitcoin; police say raid is for tax investigation, and has no connection with Bitcoin reports.

byline.original: By MICHELLE INNIS and AUSTIN RAMZY
byline.contributor: Michelle Innis reported from Sydney, Australia, and Austin Ramzy from Hong Kong.

lead_paragraph: The police said the raid was for a tax investigation, and a spokesman denied any connection to the Bitcoin reports.

headline.main: Australian Police Raid Home of Man Said to Be Likely Creator of Bitcoin
headline.print_headline: A Bitcoin Mystery and a Police Raid
